physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. A man and a woman are featured in the photograph, from head to toe. The lady is standing on the right hand side and she is wearing a blouse and sarong, while the man is wearing a short sleeved shirt, pants, and covered shoes. Both of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building
